name: tuesday_gptenv_com__jit_plugin
description: Access the Tuesday VPS shell and file system.

execCommand.description: Run any arbitrary shell command in Tuesday's tmux-managed environment. Fully interactive-capable with stdout/stderr/exit code return.

listFiles.description: List available user-facing files in Tuesday's home directory.

downloadFile.description: Stream a file as a multipart/form-data response. Filepath must be absolute or relative to the home directory.

downloadFiles.description: Download up to 10 files at once. Returns base64-encoded content for each.

uploadFiles.description: Upload up to 10 files in a single request. Each file is a separate part named 'file'.
